title: Inferring Standard Application Types using Kubernetes Resource Specifications
description: This is a project to build a system that can help cloud optimizations by finding Application type and its deprecated packages

title: Road Segmentation from High Definition Satellite Images using Deep Learning
description: This is a project that built a CBAM Attention enabled UNET Model with increased performance of 3.5% comparing conventional models

title: Wildlife Route Prediction System using Terrain Analysis and Animal Physiological Data
description: This is a project Wildlife Route Prediction System using Terrain Analysis and Animal Physiological Data in Real Time
